HeroSection.title: Elevate your workout
HeroSection.description: Transform your body and mind with state-of-the-art equipment, expert guidance, and a community that pushes you forward. Start your journey to a stronger, healthier life today.

Footer.aboutUsText: Dedicated to helping you achieve your fitness goals. We provide top-notch facilities and expert guidance.

AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.subtitle: Our Story and Mission
AboutPage.paragraph1: At Gym Explore, we believe that fitness is a journey, not a destination. Our mission is to empower individuals to achieve their health and wellness goals through state-of-the-art facilities, expert guidance, and a supportive community.
AboutPage.paragraph2: Founded in [Year], Gym Explore started with a simple vision: to create a welcoming environment where everyone, regardless of their fitness level, feels motivated to push their limits. We offer a wide range of equipment, personalized training programs, and diverse group classes tailored to meet your unique needs.
AboutPage.paragraph3: Our team of certified trainers, nutritionists, and wellness coaches is dedicated to providing you with the knowledge and tools you need to succeed. We are passionate about fostering a healthy lifestyle and are committed to helping you unlock your full potential.
AboutPage.cta: Join our community today and embark on your fitness journey with us!

ContactPage.title: Get in Touch
ContactPage.imageAlt: Modern gym environment with weight training equipment

Monday to Friday: 06:00 AM - 11:00 PM
Saturday: 08:00 AM - 06:00 PM
Sunday: Closed

ServicesPage.title: Our Services
ServicesPage.subtitle: Discover how Gym Explore can transform your fitness journey and connect you with the ideal community.
ServicesPage.imageAlt: People connecting and training in a modern gym
ServicesPage.card1Description: Find and follow friends, discover new gyms, and interact with a community of fitness enthusiasts.
ServicesPage.card2Description: Post your workout routines, nutrition tips, and achievements. Inspire and be inspired by other members.
ServicesPage.card3Description: Explore detailed gym profiles, view reviews, schedules, and offered services. Tag your gym in your posts.
ServicesPage.card4Description: By tagging gyms and interacting on the platform, you accumulate points and unlock exclusive rewards.

Features.feature1Description: Connect with other users, share tips, and find workout partners.
Features.feature2Description: Publish your routines, photos, and training videos, inspire the community.
Features.feature3Description: Earn points by interacting, completing challenges, and tagging gyms in your posts.
Features.feature4Description: Access complete gym information, including reviews, schedules, and photo gallery.
Features.feature5Description: Gyms can create profiles, promote events, and interact directly with members.
Features.feature6Description: Participate in exclusive challenges created by the community or gyms to stay motivated.

ServicesPage.ctaText: Ready to start your journey at Gym Explore?
